title: HIP-HOP: Beyond Beats and Rhymes
description:
HIP-HOP: Beyond Beats and Rhymes

  	Manhood  in a box, manipulated by big biz masquerading as roots culture


HIP-HOP: Beyond Beats and Rhymes takes an in-depth look at representations of manhood, sexism and homophobia in hip-hop culture. HIP-HOP: Beyond Beats and Rhymes premieres on the Emmy Award-winning PBS series Independent Lens on February 20, 2007
